Description:
Return to Rapture , along with Booker and Elizabeth , who find themselves in the underwater city on the eve of his fall . This DLC, developed by Irrational Games, creator of the first BioShock and BioShock Infinite, will allow you to see the enthusiasm the way no one has ever seen - a sparkling jewel on the ocean floor , built from scratch on the engine, BioShock Infinite. The gameplay has been modified to give the player the opportunity to take part in battles in the spirit of the first BioShock, and now combines the best features of BioShock and BioShock Infinite: new weapons, plasmids / Energy, Breaks , Sky line and Big Daddies .

Explore the city at a time when he was alive and beautiful , meet old "friends" and meet new in the role of Booker DeWitt . As Booker and Elizabeth were in the Rapture ? What was the city as long as it all went wrong ? Answers to these and many other questions - in BioShock Infinite: Burial at Sea - Episode 1 .
